title: Full power cut schedule for Monday released
content: Power cuts schedule for Monday (28/2/28) is as follows; 5 hours and 15 minutes (2 hours and 45 minutes during 8.30am to 4.45pm and 2 hours during 4.45pm to 9.45pm) for areas P,Q,R,S,T,U,V,W and 4 hours and 40 minutes (2 hours and 40 minutes during 8.30am to 4.30pm hours and 2 hours during 4.30pm to 10.30pm) for A,B,C areas.
